TextBody:
Hello Oscar,

Thank you for contacting our Support Department.

Could you please provide us more details regarding this issue? 

Have you tried to install the Hotfix and you are receiving an error ?

Can you share with us a screenshot with it ? 

Or after you apply the patch it not disappearing from the Live Update menu ?

Looking forward for your response.

Best regards,
__________________
Daniel Anton | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | MDM | Device Control | Content Aware Protection
www.endpointprotector.com

daniel.anton@endpointprotector.com

TextBody:
Hello Oscar,

Thank you for getting back to us.

From the screenshot I'm not able to see the error message you encounter. 
Does this message appear while is downloading the patch ? If yes, can you please verify if the port 80 is opened and the https://liveupdate.endpointprotector.com/ is also allowed in your firewall?

Can you also check under the menu View Applied Updates if the patch is present ?

Looking forward for your response.

Best regards,
__________________
Daniel Anton | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | MDM | Device Control | Content Aware Protection
www.endpointprotector.com

daniel.anton@endpointprotector.com
